import React,{useState} from "react"; function Account() { const[img,newim]=useState("img/profile_db.webp") function uplodeimg(e) { console.log(e.target.file[0]); const reader = new FileReader(); reader.onload = () => { newim(reader.e.target.file[0]); }; } return( <>
